name: Apply Design
headline: Helping realtors showcase the full potential of their properties
description:
Apply Design is a leading AI-powered virtual staging app that empowers real estate professionals to showcase the full potential of their properties to prospective buyers, helping them sell homes faster and for higher prices. 

We virtually stage over 10,000 properties monthly, transforming images of vacant or outdated spaces into fully furnished, captivating property photos. Our proprietary AI-powered software is the only solution capable of generating photorealistic designs in one click while also enabling instant customization of any detail with complete control.

This is a $10B market opportunity, given the 50M properties sold or rented annually in North America and Europe alone.

## As low as $10.5 per image
Virtual Staging with decluttering included. **Here’s how it works**
![arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ada8b4f5bff012b86ab121/64b926473eb4a41608bccdf2_Arrow%20Icon.svg)
Step 1
### Upload property images
Drag and drop any image: 2D or 360°, vacant or with furniture, taken by any device.
![Drag & drop furniture](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ada8b4f5bff012b86ab121/66e862ed953ff7c5ec6cdbf1_AI%20Virtual%20Staging%20Photo%20Card.avif)
![Drag & drop furniture](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ada8b4f5bff012b86ab121/66e862edacca33455053547f_Furniture%20Removal%20AI%20Virtual%20Staging.avif)
Step 2
### Instant furniture removal
Our AI Decluttering tool will remove your existing furniture automatically with one click.
Step 3
### Get photorealistic results
Generate best-in-class renders based on your layout and style preferences in just 10 minutes per image.
![Drag & drop furniture](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ada8b4f5bff012b86ab121/66e862edfbc7e4a0eb4d670d_Photorealistic%20Results%20\(1\).avif)
![Drag & drop furniture](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ada8b4f5bff012b86ab121/66e862ed953ff7c5ec6cdbf5_Multi%20Angle%20AI%20Staging.avif)
Step 4
### Keep designs consistent
Easily replicate designs in multiple images of the same space, or reuse your favorites in any of your projects.
Step 5
### On-the-spot revisions
Make lightning-fast design customizations with our intuitive drag-and-drop editor.
![Drag & drop furniture](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ada8b4f5bff012b86ab121/66e862ede5d1bff0ead5c833_Customize%20Anything%20AI%20Virtual%20Staging.avif)
## Furniture to capture any mood
Mix and match styles to attract any client or buyer with our vast catalog of **12,000+ furniture pieces**

## As low as $10.5 per image
Virtual Staging with decluttering included. **Here’s how it works**
![arrow⟨21⟩]
Step 1
### Upload property images
Drag and drop any image: 2D or 360°, vacant or with furniture, taken by any device.
![Drag & drop furniture⟨22⟩]
![Drag & drop furniture⟨23⟩]
Step 2
### Instant furniture removal
Our AI Decluttering tool will remove your existing furniture automatically with one click.
Step 3
### Get photorealistic results
Generate best-in-class renders based on your layout and style preferences in just 10 minutes per image.
![Drag & drop furniture⟨24⟩].avif)
![Drag & drop furniture⟨25⟩]
Step 4
### Keep designs consistent
Easily replicate designs in multiple images of the same space, or reuse your favorites in any of your projects.
Step 5
### On-the-spot revisions
Make lightning-fast design customizations with our intuitive drag-and-drop editor.
![Drag & drop furniture⟨26⟩]

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Apply Design**

Founded in 2021 and located in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel, Apply Design has quickly established itself as a game-changer in the real estate market by leveraging AI to elevate property presentations. As a standout member of Y Combinator's Batch S22, the company is driven by a straightforward yet ambitious mission: to help realtors showcase the full potential of their listings, enabling faster sales at higher prices.

**Service Offering**

At the heart of Apply Design's innovation is its AI-powered virtual staging app, which allows real estate professionals to transform over 10,000 property images monthly. This cutting-edge software provides users with photorealistic designs at the click of a button, offering instant customization down to the finest detail. Prospective buyers can see properties not just as vacant spaces but as inviting homes, greatly enhancing their appeal.

**Market Opportunity**

Operating within a $10 billion market, Apply Design is positioned to capitalize on the vast number of properties sold or rented annually—approximately 50 million in North America and Europe. This gives the company an expansive canvas to paint its success.

**Core Features**

- **Fast Turnaround**: Users receive staged images within 10 minutes.
- **Unlimited Revisions**: Flexibility and creativity in design without extra cost.
- **Customization**: With a catalog of over 12,000 furniture pieces, users can tailor designs to fit any style or mood.
- **User-Friendly**: Any agent, regardless of their design background, can easily produce appealing virtual stages.

**Customer Praise**

With a diverse client base that includes top real estate firms like Keller Williams and Coldwell Banker, Apply Design has garnered testimonials highlighting its role in transforming marketing strategies. Customers frequently express satisfaction with the tool's ease of use and the impressive quality of the final products, confirming its value in the competitive real estate landscape.

**Pricing**

With competitive pricing starting around $10.50 per image and a DIY option for just $7, Apply Design makes virtual staging accessible to a wide range of real estate professionals.

**Conclusion**

If you’re in real estate and looking for ways to stand out, Apply Design offers a unique solution that combines technology with creativity to enhance property presentation. Embrace the future of real estate marketing with just a click and transform ordinary property photos into captivating showcases. Check them out at [Apply Design](http://www.applydesign.io).
